name: protocol-mcp
description: MCP server that connects to wetlab protocol resources, including protocols.io

tools.name: search_protocols
tools.description: Search protocols.io for laboratory protocols by query string

tools.name: get_protocol
tools.description: Retrieve full protocol details from protocols.io by identifier

arguments.name: protocol_id
arguments.description: Protocol identifier: URI, DOI, or numeric ID from search results

env.name: PROTOCOLS_IO_ACCESS_TOKEN
env.description: protocols.io API access token (optional for public protocols, required for private)
